# <a name="change-your-language-date-and-time-format-or-time-zone-in-outlook-on-the-web"></a><span data-ttu-id="477d6-102">Endre språk-, dato- og klokkeslettformat eller tidssone i Outlook på nettet</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="477d6-102">Change your language, date and time format, or time zone in Outlook on the web</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="477d6-103">Øverst på siden velger du</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="477d6-103">At the top of the page, select</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="477d6-104">**Innstillinger** > **Vis alle Outlook-innstillinger**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="477d6-104">**Settings** > **View all Outlook settings**.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="477d6-105">Velg **Generelt** > **språk og klokkeslett**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="477d6-105">Select **General** > **Language and time**.</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="477d6-106">Velg språket du vil bruke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="477d6-106">Select the language you want to use.</span></span>
4. <span data-ttu-id="477d6-107">Velg **Lagre**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="477d6-107">Select **Save**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="477d6-108">Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, kan du se [Endre tidssonen og språkinnstillingene i Outlook på nettet](https://support.office.com/article/65239869-12e7-4a9d-bca1-76b0ad7ce273).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="477d6-108">To learn more, see [Change the time zone and language settings in Outlook on the web](https://support.office.com/article/65239869-12e7-4a9d-bca1-76b0ad7ce273).</span></span>
